snippet.title: Super Stardust™ HD Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Presenting the Solo and Team mode add-on upgrade packs for Super Stardust™ HD. The Solo add-on introduces three new game modes - Endless, Survival and Time Attack - plus remixed music tracks and revamped visuals. The Team Pack add-on features split-screen versus and co-op modes. Co-op mode allows two players to play through the game cooperatively, while versus multiplayer allows up to 4-player split-screen competition in modes such as Deathmatch and King of the Hill. The Team Pack also features a Ship Editor feature that allows players to customize their spacecraft, as well as enhanced visual effects.

©2007 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by Housemarque OY.
